title: 818. Breaking Down the Scouting Process with Lance Zierlein
itunes:title: 818. Breaking Down the Scouting Process with Lance Zierlein
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode of Move the Sticks and is joined by NFL Media's Lance Zierlein. To start off, the guys discuss how they deal with social media trolls. Then, the pair do a deep dive on the scouting and grading process. They further focus on having strong opinions while scouting, touch on scouting film vs. in-person scouting, and much more.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
